channel.title: ~ [VERY EASY] - Basic ShopMaker - [TO USE] ~
channel.description:
[center][b]This ShopMaker Is The Best! - It's very easy to use, It Tells you exactly where to put the codes you generate!
~ Download link: http://uppit.com/v/C8HRN3VY ~
~~~ I Released this because some people was having problems with the other shopmakers So i decided to release this awesome shopmaker, because it's very easy to use and it will Solve everyones "Shop Making" Problems. :D ~~
[IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh55/Kingen50cent/enjoy.jpg[/img]
*This has no virus at all, scan it yourself, i'm using it myself so it has no problems!*
I Realized that it generates this code wrong: [code]else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }[/code] All you gotta do there is to put an other "O" So it becomes "Coords" Not "Cords".
Credits: JayWalker - 99,9% *Original Owner & Maker Of This Program* Me(Kingen50cent) - 0,1% For Releasing It ;)

item.title: ~ [VERY EASY] - Basic ShopMaker - [TO USE] ~
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:6, topic:325576”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=421889.msg3097564#msg3097564 date=1263474486]
It has no sence to release this, 1 you didnt make it. And 2 do you have permission to release it? I don’t think so.
And that’s old stuff, people know how to make a shop in 3 secs without a shopmaker…
[/quote]

1.Do you have proof that some people can make shops in 3 secs without a shopmaker?
2.Everyone has permissions to use this one, as long as you give credits to the original owner for it.
3.It might be old but it’s still easy & working
4.It can be useful for some people.

EDIT: I Realized that it generates this code wrong:

else if (NPCID == 520) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 30; }
All you gotta do there (i think) is to put an other “O” So it becomes “Coords” Not “Cords”.[/quote]

Shop maker is useless, even when I was first learning to code I never used it. I’d rather make my own shops.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ [VERY EASY] - Basic ShopMaker - [TO USE] ~
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

[center][b]This ShopMaker Is The Best! - It’s very easy to use,
It Tells you exactly where to put the codes you generate!

~ Download link: http://uppit.com/v/C8HRN3VY ~

So i decided to release this awesome shopmaker, because it's very easy to use and it will
Solve everyones "Shop Making" Problems. :D ~~

[IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh55/Kingen50cent/enjoy.jpg[/img]

*This has no virus at all, scan it yourself, i'm using it myself so it has no problems!*

I Realized that it generates this code wrong:
[code]else if (NPCID == 520) {
	PutNPCCords = true;
	WanneShop = 30;
}[/code]
All you gotta do there is to put an other "O" So it becomes "Coords" Not "Cords".

Credits:
JayWalker - 99,9% *Original Owner & Maker Of This Program*
Me(Kingen50cent) - 0,1% For Releasing It ;)

Read full topic
